summary: Darkshade Cottage, is a small farmers hut set just down river from Darkshade Cave and near Cradlecrush Rock. With a Hunter Merchant Ferilan outside doing his daily duties.
descriptionHtml:
Darkshade Cottage, is a small farmers hut set just down river from Darkshade Cave and near Cradlecrush Rock. 
The cottage is best suited for those who enjoy the life of hunting and farming, but is also well suited for people who like to get away from the troubles of city life. Adventurous types may also benefit due to it location been near both Darkshade and Cradlecrush. 

-----[ No DLC Required ]----- 

This Cottage Includes: 

- A Hunter Merchant (Works During The Morning) (Trading Ends 22:00) 
- Several Chickens 
- Farm (Containing Potatoes, Leeks and Cabbages) 
- Interior Dynamic Lighting 
- Mannequin 
- Cooking Pots 
- Workbench, Anvil, Tanning Rack and Chopping Block. 
- A Custom Written Book On The Cupboard. 
- Fast Travel Marker. 

Looks Best With These Mods: (Optional, Not Required)

- Dense Vegetation 
- HD Plants and Herbs 
- Lush Trees and Grass 
- W.A.T.E.R 
- Better Embers 
- Static Mesh Improvment Mod (SMIM)
- Skyrim HD 2k Textures

I Hope You Enjoy This Mod And Hope You Enjoy Your New Home. 
If You Do Find Any Bugs Please Message Me And They Will Be Fixed. 

--------[ Optional Without Mannequin Available ]---------

Thank You. 

-----------------[ Please Rate]----------------- 

-----------------[ Bug Fixes/Patches ]------------------- 

1.3 

[Added] Rowing Boat next to Fishing Rack. 
[Added] Lantern and Banner to the Cairn at the top of the road to the Cottage. 
[Fixed] Ferilans\' Health and stats (Lowered). 
[Removed] Grass from under Fishing Rack. 

1.2 

[Added] Enchanted Bow inside house. (Master Huntsman Bow) 
[Added] Herbs/Vegetables to the farm. 

1.1 

[Fixed] Nav Mesh issues causing NPCs to walk into fences and the house, become stuck. 
[Fixed] Lighting area increased on gate light. 
[Added] Flame to hunters camp fire.
author: IamBonehead
